metadata.dc:author: Alvarez Alvarez, I
Casas Rubio, C
Alonso Orcajo, N
Díaz Villarig, J L
Rodrigo Tapia, J P
metadata.dc:description: Basal cell adenoma is a subtype of salivary monomorphic adenoma that usually appears in the parotid gland. Its pathological differentiation from adenoid cyst carcinomas is difficult. It is treated by surgical excision. In this study we describe the clinical and pathological features of a case in an atypical patient.
metadata.dc:title: Adenoma parotídeo de células basales. Presentación de un caso inusual y revisión de la bibliografía.
[Basal cell parotid adenoma. Report of an unusual case and review of literature].
